description: Angular component for displaying a recipe card, including image, title, description, rating, and tags. It uses Angular decorators, template syntax, and styling to render recipe information within the application.

classes.name: RecipeCardComponent
classes.description: Angular standalone component that renders a recipe's brief information, including image, title, rating, description, and tags, with routing links to the detailed recipe view.

methods.name: RecipeCardComponent
methods.description: Constructor for the component class, initializes placeholder image URL and loading state.
